channel.title: CVE Feed for libvirt -- libvirt
channel.description: The latest CVEs for libvirt -- libvirt

item.title: CVE-2020-10703|2024-08-04T11:06:11.183Z -- libvirt -- libvirt
item.description: A NULL pointer dereference was found in the libvirt API responsible introduced in upstream version 3.10.0, and fixed in libvirt 6.0.0, for fetching a storage pool based on its target path. In more detail, this flaw affects storage pools created without a target path such as network-based pools like gluster and RBD. Unprivileged users with a read-only connection could abuse this flaw to crash the libvirt daemon, resulting in a potential denial of service.
